original_title: Andy Ruiz Jr. vs. Luis Ortiz
overview: Former unified world champion Andy "The Destroyer" Ruiz takes on hard-hitting contender Luis "King Kong" Ortiz in an explosive heavyweight showdown.  Jose Valenzuela vs. Edwin De Los Santos  Abner Mares vs. Miguel Flores  Isaac Cruz vs. Eduardo Ramirez
title: Andy Ruiz Jr. vs. Luis Ortiz
